response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a wealth of features that are sure to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $12,000. However, I am willing to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving compared to its market value. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 11000}
